82322.summary: Some customers in the Maplewood area of North Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82322.title: Aug 21 - North Vancouver (Maplewood) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
